Description: Rarely-played. Amazing condition, classic, George-Harrison-style hollow-body.Incredible tone.Original Gretsch Hardshell Case.From driving rhythm to ripping leads, the classic double-cutaway G6122-1962 Country Gentleman Classic does it all. Features include dual High Sensitive Filter'Tron™ pickups, three-piece maple neck, ebony fingerboard with Neo Classic™ thumbnail inlays, double mutes, back pad, gold plexi pickguard, gold-plated hardware, Grover tuners and Bigsby B6G vibrato tailpiece. Essentially a replica of the guitar used by George Harrison when the Beatles made their US debut on the Ed Sullivan Show. This particular Gretsch G6122 is in excellent condition, no fret wear. Never gigged, stayed at home -- there are a very few mild surface scratches from light play. Warranty, and other original "case-candy" paperwork (see pics) The OHSC has one or two small nicks, but that's it! Great, well-cared for classic. • Walnut Stain • Laminated Maple Body • Maple Neck • Ebony Fretboard with Binding • 12" Fretboard Radius • Simulated F-holes • Neo Classic Thumbnail Inlays• Pickup Switching : 3-Position Toggle: Position 1. Bridge Pickup, Position 2. Bridge and Neck Pickups, Position 3. Neck Pickup• Auxiliary Switching : 3-Position Master Tone Switch: Position 1. Medium Level, High Frequency Roll Off. Position 2. Switch Out of Circuit, Pickup Wide Open. Position 3. Slight Level, High Frequency Roll Off• Scale Length 25.5" • Authentic, original Gretsch FilterTron Pickups • Grover Imperial Tuners• Gold Plexi Pickguard • Knurled Strap Retainer Knobs• "G" Arrow Knobs• Adjustable Truss Rod• B6G Bigby Tailpiece • Gold Colored Chrome Plated Hardware • 22 Frets • Gretsch Deluxe Hard Shell Case
Title: 2013 Gretsch Country Gentleman G6122-1962
